Title: Easy Guide to Pudge, The Butcher

ItemTooltips.blink: Same purpose as Force Stuff, initiate or escape, use it as you want
ItemTooltips.gauntlets: Some extra health and damage, later build to Urn of Shadows
ItemTooltips.boots: Boots of Speed provides pretty enought speed for Pudge
ItemTooltips.bottle: Very usefull for Pudge on mid lane, allows you to regen mana and health and bottling runes.
ItemTooltips.tango: Basic regeneration to heal up after lasthitting creeps with Rot
ItemTooltips.travel_boots: Boots of speed and force staff is enought speed for pudge, but if late game, use travels!
ItemTooltips.urn_of_shadows: Really good for helping your team, and you to heal. Also if enemy is escaping, you can use it and it will possibly kill him
ItemTooltips.force_staff: One of my favourite items on Pudge. It is great, it allows you to perform very long hooks, and it also good for escape, or helping your teammates.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: Dismember will last longer, and gives more damage AND heal you while ultimate
ItemTooltips.heart: Extreme health regeneration, you should sold bottle untile this item
ItemTooltips.hood_of_defiance: Good regeneration item + you will take less damage from Rot. I don't recommend to build it into Pipe of Insight.
ItemTooltips.invis_sword: Initiate or escape. Beware of sentries.
ItemTooltips.soul_ring: If you need to hook really alot. Also, fountain hook
ItemTooltips.arcane_boots: If you need to hook really alot.

AbilityTooltips.pudge_meat_hook: Your bread and butter. Pure damage with ministun
AbilityTooltips.pudge_rot: Use to lasthit creeps, lasthit enemies or commiting suicide
AbilityTooltips.pudge_flesh_heap: Kill a lot and you'll have tons of HP
AbilityTooltips.pudge_dismember: Basic pudge combo: Hook+Rot+Dismember. Just remember it is channeling, so don't fail by canceling it
